Claim: "A man is carrying a bag on his back."
Implication: "A man is outside with no bag on his back."
Referring expressions: A man, bag, his back  A man, outside, no bag on his back.
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsCarriedOnBack(a,c)))) -> (exists e (exists a (IsOutside(a) and IsWithoutBagOnBack(a,e))))
